welcomeMessage: Welcome to the First Interview experience.
By answering just 5 free text questions, we can identify your candidate's personality traits and behaviours. Yes, really!
We'll then recommend candidates who match your success profile.
Everything you see here can be customised - text, colours, branding. Time to get creative!
We can even add videos to showcase you as an employer or give a taste of the job on offer.
welcomeMessageCon: If you want to know more about how this chat works
If you’re good to go, fill in your details and press the Accept button. Use of our platform is subject to our
Before we get started, can I get your first name and last name?
identificationMess: Thanks! We also offer the capability for multi-choice questions which can support both behavioural and personality identification, or capture additional information such as right to work, availability, or demographic data.

For example, these next three questions don't form part of your assessment but will be used to help us understand the diversity of your workforce. Please select the multiple-choice option that most relates to you.
Do you identify as Aboriginal or Torres Strait Islander?
arrayMessBeginTest: So that you get the full candidate experience, try and answer each of the 5 questions with between 50 and 150 words.
That way you (like every single one of your candidates) will receive personalised feedback - how good is that?
If your candidates experience any issues or require support, they can access our candidate hub or chat to our support team by
The questions are bespoke for each job family - we'll work with you to find out your "employee DNA" and then design the questions to match
Ready to give it a go?
By the way, we can provide an introduction to each question that can relate to a particular element of the job or your core values but for this demo, let's just go with questions...

Customers are our number one priority, it’s all about making sure the customer has the best shopping experience. Tell us about a time you went out of your way to make a difference to someone that improved their day?
submitMess: Great! That’s all the questions we have. Click the button below to submit your responses, and keep an eye out in your inbox for your personality profile.
successfulMess: We'd love to get feedback on your interview experience today. This is confidential and won't affect your application
finalMessage: Your feedback matters to us, share a few comments about your application and first interview experience.
